body: Update to Kafka 2.3.1
- Update Kafka to 2.1.0
- Update to Kafka 2.0.0
- Update Kafka version and deps (thanks @jiminhsieh)

- Update to Kafka 1.1.0
- Update akka -> 2.5.12
- Add support to call configure method of serializer/deserializers (https://github.com/cakesolutions/scala-kafka-client/pull/133) - @keremk 
- Set embedded Kafka server to use localhost - @glorat
- Support Kafka 1.0.0

* Upgrade to Kafka 0.11.0.1
* Optional partition callbacks in AutoParititon Mode (https://github.com/cakesolutions/scala-kafka-client/pull/124/files)
* New subscription mode ManualOffsetForTimes, like ManualOffset, but provide timestamps for initial seek position (thanks @tonicebrian)

* Update to Kafka 0.11.0.0
* Add configuration options for new transactional settings
- Minor tweak to Provider API (thanks @danbim )

- Update Kafka to 0.10.2.1
- Update Akka to 2.4.18

- Update Kafka to 0.10.2.0
- Update dependencies
- Minor tweaks to logging verbosity

- Crossbuild for Scala 2.11.8 and 2.12.1
- Added maxMetaDataAge to KafkaConsumer (thanks @nitendragautam)
- KafkaConsumerActor now terminates on downstream receiver actor termination (thanks @yoks)
- Fixed bug related to Exception Handling in KafkaProducer (thanks @conniec)

- Added new subscription mode: AutoPartitionWithManualOffset - Documented [here](https://github.com/cakesolutions/scala-kafka-client/wiki/Message%20Exchange%20Patterns).
- Updated Akka to 2.4.14.
- Added new Retry count config, to prevent overwhelming an unresponsive downstream client.  Documented [here](https://github.com/cakesolutions/scala-kafka-client/wiki/KafkaConsumerActor%20Configuration).

- Supports Kafka client driver v0.10.1.0
- Added support for new Consumer property: max.poll.interval
- Removed log4j-over-slf4j dependency - suggest adding this in dependant projects if using slf4j.
- Added examples to source

- Subscribe model changed, now supports more explicit subscription types
- Handling of partition rebalances improved
- ConsumerActor failure and restart mechanics improved
- Versioning scheme changed
- Testkit improvements
- ConsumerActor wrapper API provided
- Tested against Kafka 0.10.0.1

- Subscribe model changed, now supports more explicit subscription types
- Handling of partition rebalances improved
- ConsumerActor failure and restart mechanics improved
- Versioning scheme changed
- Testkit improvements
- ConsumerActor wrapper API provided
- Tested against Kafka 0.9.0.0

Supports the 0.10.0.0 Kafka Client

Added new "max.poll.records" config option to consumer.

Supports 0.9.0.x Kafka Client

Producer Actor complete
Consumer Actor complete
Improved error handling
Bug fixes
Async consumer released
https://bintray.com/simonsouter/maven/scala-kafka-client/0.2.0/view
